snare.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a trap for catching an animal, especially one that uses a wire or rope to catch the animal by its foot
snare.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A rabbit was caught in the snare.
snare.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: something that is intended to trick someone and get them into a difficult situation
snare.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: I didn’t want to fall into the same snare again.
snare.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to catch an animal by using a snare
snare.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to get something or someone you want in a clever way, often by deceiving other people
snare.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: She’s hoping to snare a wealthy husband.
